Getting Started Todo App Part 2

Date: 17 September 2012

This handout will help guide you through building your application with Backbone and Backbone.Marionette.

Getting Started Todo App Part 1

Date: 17 September 2012

This handout will help guide you through the process of laying out your new javascript application. We will be using some newer technologies such as RequireJS, Backbone, Marionette, Sass, Grunt, Jasmine, And Twitter Bootstrap.
